```{r setup, include=FALSE}
d <- read.csv('./src/data/Raw Movie Data.csv')

actors <- read.csv('./src/data/Greatest Actors List.csv')

```


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
summary(d)

short_data <- drop(d$dvd_release)


# exclude variables "production", "dvd_release", "imdbid", poster, keywords
myvars <- names(d) %in% c("production", "dvd_release", "imdbid", "poster", "keywords")
short_data <- d[!myvars]

```


```{r}
# Transform budget and box office columns to numeric
numeric_data <- transform(short_data, Box.Office.Gross = as.numeric(Box.Office.Gross))
numeric_data <- transform(numeric_data, Budget = as.numeric(Budget))

# Remove entries without box office gross
clean_data<-numeric_data[!(is.na(numeric_data$Box.Office.Gross)),]
# Remove entries without budget
clean_data<-clean_data[!(is.na(clean_data$Budget)),]

# Add the profitability column

clean_data$Profitability.Ratio <- clean_data$Box.Office.Gross / clean_data$Budget

```
